mapper.insert: insert into tb_sku_attribute (SKU_ATTR_ID, SKU_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE_ID, IS_MUST, IS_DEFAULT,PRICE_PLUS, `STATUS`, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{skuAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pricePlus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tb_sku_attribute
SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ATTR_ID = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ATTR_VALUE_ID = #{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_MUST = #{isMust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE_PLUS = #{pricePlus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SKU_ATTR_ID = #{skuAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_sku_attribute set SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ATTR_ID = #{attrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ATTR_VALUE_ID = #{attrValueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_MUST = #{isMust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE_PLUS = #{pricePlus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SKU_ATTR_ID = #{skuAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.SKU_ATTR_ID ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.ATTR_ID ,T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID ,T1.IS_MUST ,T1.IS_DEFAULT ,T1.PRICE_PLUS ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU_ATTRIBUTE T1

SELECT T1.SKU_ATTR_ID ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.ATTR_ID ,T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID ,T1.IS_MUST ,T1.IS_DEFAULT ,T1.PRICE_PLUS ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU_ATTRIBUTE T1 WHERE T1.SKU_ATTR_ID = #{skuAttrId}

SELECT T1.SKU_ATTR_ID ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.ATTR_ID ,(SELECT A1.ATTR_NAME FROM TB_ATTRIBUTE A1 WHERE A1.ATTR_ID = T1.ATTR_ID) AS ATTR_NAME ,T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID ,(SELECT B1.ATTR_VALUE FROM TB_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE B1 WHERE B1.ATTR_VALUE_ID = T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID) AS ATTR_VALUE ,T1.IS_MUST ,T1.IS_DEFAULT ,T1.PRICE_PLUS ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU_ATTRIBUTE T1 WHERE T1.SKU_ID = #{skuId}

SELECT T1.SKU_ATTR_ID ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.ATTR_ID ,T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID ,T1.IS_MUST ,T1.IS_DEFAULT ,T1.PRICE_PLUS ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,T1.CREATE_TIME ,T1.UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU_ATTRIBUTE T1 WHERE T1.ATTR_VALUE_ID = #{attrValueId}
